name: Woedend!
description:
'Let's use communication to add something to everyday life. To give. We like to make communication that makes life nicer, more entertaining, stuff that feels accessible, that offers an advantage or something to take with you. We want to offer a useful tool, a bit of wisdom or simply a smile.'
Woedend! exists because we are relentlessly curious to what moves people to do something. Or not to. We can't force them, so how can we convince them.
